package.name: Anima
package.shortDescription: Mediaboxhd should work fine on ios 13 on an iPad and iPhone Firmware should be greater than 7.0

descriptionlist.description: Watch Movies and Tv Shows for free!
I did not make this app I am just providing a way to install it on your device.

You can also have
a multi-line item.
